https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zGbrjMq0JZesROF6Xji20GBtgay.jpg A blind washed up musician on the verge of becoming homeless seeks to derail his roommate's wedding in a desperate attempt to keep from being thrown out onto the street. Best Man in the Dark
